subdisciplines.name: Intersectionality
subdisciplines.description: Examining how social identities intersect and affect experiences of oppression and privilege.

subdisciplines.name: Queer Theory
subdisciplines.description: Exploring the complexities of sexual and gender identities and challenging heteronormativity.

subdisciplines.name: Transgender Studies
subdisciplines.description: Centering the experiences and perspectives of transgender individuals and communities in feminist scholarship.
